mapper.select: select count(*) from topic where topicId=#{topicId}
mapper.update: update users set selectedSignal=#{selectedSignal} where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select l.userId,u1.studentName,u1.majorIn,l.userState,u1.selectedSignal,u1.topicId,u1.topicName,u1.demand,u1.teacherId,u1.teacherName from login l left join (select u.userId,u.userName as studentName,u.majorIn,u.selectedSignal,c1.topicId,c1.topicName,c1.demand,c1.teacherId,c1.userName as teacherName from users u left join (select c.userId,t.teacherId,t.topicId,t.topicName,t.demand,t.userName from choose c left join (select t1.topicId,t1.topicName,t1.demand,t2.userId as teacherId,t2.userName from topic t1 left join (select tt.userId,tt.topicId,t3.userName from topic_teacher tt left join (select userId,userName from users)t3 on tt.userId=t3.userId)t2 on t2.topicId=t1.topicId)t on c.topicId=t.topicId)c1 on c1.userId=u.userId)u1 on u1.userId=l.userId where userState='user'
